conversation_history.content:
Hello! I'm your hookah recommendation assistant. I'm here to help you find the perfect hookah based on your preferences and budget.

I can help you with:
 Finding hookahs based on your needs
 Budget-friendly recommendations
 Color and design preferences
 Portable vs home hookah options
 LED and special features

What kind of hookah are you looking for today?

I'd love to help you find the perfect hookah!

To give you the best recommendations, could you tell me:
• What's your budget range?
• Do you need it to be portable for travel?
• Are you interested in LED lighting?
• Will you use it at home, for travel, or parties?
